job description:
Principal Software Engineer Data Science
Based just north of Dallas, we are a well-known Advertising and analytics company. We are growing at a rapid pace and looking to hire a Data Scientist to design, develop and implement large scale big data science product components as part of analytical products in the cloud and on premises. If you are a Data scientist with experience implementing common and new machine learning, text mining and other data science driven solutions on cloud based technologies, please read on!
What You Will Be Doing
- Implementing common and new machine learning, text mining and other data science driven solutions on cloud based technologies
What You Need for this Position
More Than 7 Years of experience and knowledge of:

- Data Science
- R/Python/Scala
- Web Services and API's
- Agile
- Machine Learning
- AWS
What's In It for You
- Vacation/PTO
- Medical
- Dental
- Vision
- Relocation
- Bonus
- 401k
So, if you are a Data scientist with the appropriate experience, please apply today!
